The expert: s verdict highlighted the fact that the Canalside and downtown sites, although disputed, are only a block or two apart on the railroad tracks. Despite this proximity, there is a disagreement over the categorization of the locations as Canalside or downtown.
There is a disagreement between Congress: Higgins refers to two downtown options as Canalside locations based on a consultant's report, while Mayor Brown argues that the proposed sites are not at Canalside.
